DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate if Electromagnetic navigation (ENB) in combination with rapid on site evaluation (ROSE) can improve diagnostic accuracy in those patients who fail to be diagnosed with conventional fluoroscopic assisted bronchoscopy (FBS) in combination with ROSE.
DOC.brief_title: Conventional Bronchoscopy Plus Rose Versus Electromagnetic Navigation (EMN) Plus Rose in Small Peripheral Lesions
DOC.criteria: presence of small peripheral lung lesions (< 3 cm) in patient suitable for surgical procedure patient with metastatic disease patients unfit for surgical procedure
